page.title: 20Petworth: Add' Information
page.content: In addition to the Leconfield Hall in the Market Square, other meeting places in the town are :- The Youth Centre (Midhurst Road), The Red Cross Centre (off the Square) and Newlands (Chichester District Council Area Office where the Parish Council meets).The rifle club uses The Armoury (Midhurst Rd.). Other Services include - The Fire Station (Station Rd. unmanned) and The Telephone Exchange in the Car Park. Industry is situated on the new Estate near Hampers Green and also in Pound St. (Insulation Services) and New St. (Plastic Safety Coatings). Non_food shops usually sell antiques and are linked with tourists using the House and the Park. Gasholders are situated in Station Road and Southern Water at Haslingbourne..
